Title: Enacts the Health Care Tax Reform Act
Summary: Enacts the Health Care Tax Reform Act; eliminates certain taxes and assessments on health insurance.
LawCode: Amd §206, Fin Serv L; amd §1502-a, Tax L; amd §§2807-j & 2807-s, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, the tax law and the public health law, in relation to enacting the Health Care Tax Reform Act
